main event: On March 23, 1957, a UFO sighting near Oxnard Air Force Base was reported by the National Investigations Committee on Aerial Phenomena (NICAP). Four UFOs were tracked by radar, with an Air Force jet fighter scrambled to investigate but unable to make visual contact with the objects.
interesting points: Multiple UFOs were tracked by radar near Oxnard Air Force Base on March 23, 1957, arond midnight.
An Air Force jet fighter was scrambled to investigate, but was unable to make visual contact with the objects.
The National Investigations Committee on Aerial Phenomena requested information regarding the classification of the report and the authority responsible for classification.
witnesses: National Investigations Committee on Aerial Phenomena (NICAP)
